testcase.name: To check Register with mandatroy filed only
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser and launch url...........................................passed When click "register_link" button...........................................passed When enter mandatroy filed only.............................................passed And click "register_submit" button..........................................passed Then system should display "registrationCompleted" message..................passed

testcase.name: To check Login with valid credential
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser and launch url...........................................passed When click "login_link" button..............................................passed When enter email and password...............................................passed And click "login_submit" button.............................................passed Then user should navigate to home page......................................passed

testcase.name: View product in cart after adding
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser and launch url...........................................passed When the user enters a "validProductName" in the search field...............passed And click "search" button...................................................passed And click "Add to Cart" button..............................................passed And click "shopping Cart" button............................................passed And check added product should present in the cart page.....................passed

testcase.name: Verify order confirm details and place order
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser and launch url...........................................passed And the user logs in with valid credentials.................................passed And the user add product to the cart........................................passed Given user accept terms and condition.......................................passed When click "Checkout" button................................................passed And process all checkout steps..............................................passed Then system should display "orderConfirm" message...........................passed
